name: 蔡孟廷
objective: 在既有結構系統的認知基礎上，建立對建築材料特性(RC結構、鋼結構及木結構等)及結構系統的整合能力。除了針對案例分析及建築結構系統、材料特性進行分析解說外，配合設計案例並透過簡單的數值分析(Numerical Analysis)操作訓練，培養學生在建築結構系統及造型整合上的設計能力。
schedule:
week 1:    Introduction: Course Outline and Objective
week 2:   Structural Form I: Surface Active Structural System
week 3:   Structural Form II: Form Active Structural System
week 4    Design Studio: Individual Assignment
week 5:   Structural Form III: Section Active Structural System
week 6:   Structural Form IV: Vector Active Structural System
week 7:   Structural Form V: Height Active Structural System
week 8:   Design Studio: Individual Assignment
week 9:   Introduction of Numerical Analysis

week 10:  Mid-term Presentation

week 11: Materials & Systems of Construction I: Wood Construction I
week 12: Materials & Systems of Construction I: Wood Construction II
week 13: Case Study:  Individual Assignment
week 14: Materials & Systems of Construction II: Natural Construction
week 15: Materials & Systems of Construction III: Brick & Concrete
week 16: Materials & Systems of Construction III: Steel Construction
week 17: Design Studio: Group Discussion

week 18:  Final Presentation
materials:
1. Structure System, Heino Engel
2. Santiago Calatrava: The Complete Work, Alexander Tzonis
3. BUILDING CONSTRUCTION
    PRINCIPLES, MATERIALS AND SYSTEMS
    MADAN MEHTA, WALTER SCARBOROUGH, DIANE ARMPRIEST
